means: （指登山者、步行者使用或背小孩时使用的）背包， （有轻金属框的）箱形背包

sentence.Network_en: Looking back, she feels she should never have hung up her backpack.
sentence.Network_cn: 回首过去，她觉得自己真不该放下背包不再徒步旅行。

sentence.Network_en: He squirmed out of the straps of his backpack.
sentence.Network_cn: 他扭动身体，挣开背包的肩带。

sentence.Network_en: She found a seat, stowed her backpack and sat down.
sentence.Network_cn: 她找到一个座位，把背包放好，坐了下来。

entry.def: A backpack is a bag with straps that go over your shoulders, so that you can carry things on your back when you are walking or climbing.

means.word_mean: 1. a bag carried by a strap on your back or shoulder

sentences.sentence: "Every summer they are backpacking in the Rockies"
